body_html:
Hi! I wrote a custom binarizer inspired from @harpone 's code. But I am facing problem if nan output cost when using it in two copies of same network simultaneously. Detailed question is here on stackoverflow : http://stackoverflow.com/questions/40735766/tensorflow-custom-operation-used-in-two-networks-simultaneously-produces-nan

Could anyone please answer my query?

body:
Hi! I wrote a custom binarizer inspired from @harpone 's code. But I am facing problem if nan output cost when using it in two copies of same network simultaneously. Detailed question is here on stackoverflow : http://stackoverflow.com/questions/40735766/tensorflow-custom-operation-used-in-two-networks-simultaneously-produces-nan

Could anyone please answer my query?
